name: The Forest Hiker
summary: Breathtaking hike through the Canadian Banff National Park
description: Experience the wonders of the Canadian wilderness with a guided hike through the majestic Banff National Park. Traverse through serene forests, spot wildlife, and enjoy the peace of nature. This tour is perfect for those looking for a leisurely yet fulfilling outdoor adventure.

name: The Sea Explorer
summary: Exploring the jaw-dropping US east coast by foot and by boat
description: Embark on an unforgettable journey along the US east coast, combining thrilling boat rides with scenic coastal walks. Discover hidden beaches, explore lighthouses, and enjoy stunning sunrises over the Atlantic Ocean. Ideal for those seeking a mix of adventure and relaxation.

name: The Snow Adventurer
summary: Exciting adventure in the snow with snowboarding and skiing
description: Join us for an adrenaline-packed adventure in the snow. This tour features world-class snowboarding and skiing, with professional instructors guiding you through challenging terrains. Whether you're a thrill-seeker or a winter sports enthusiast, this tour offers the ultimate snowy escape.

name: The City Wanderer
summary: Living the life of Wanderlust in the US' most beautiful cities
description: Explore the vibrant culture and iconic landmarks of America's most famous cities. From the historical streets of Boston to the skyline of New York, this tour offers a taste of urban exploration at its finest. Perfect for those wanting to experience the best of US city life.

name: The Park Camper
summary: Breathing in Nature in America's most spectacular National Parks
description: Get ready to camp under the stars in some of the most breathtaking national parks in the US. With guided nature walks, wildlife spotting, and campfire storytelling, this tour is the perfect way to reconnect with nature and unwind in the great outdoors.

name: The Sports Lover
summary: Surfing, skating, parajumping, rock climbing and more, all in one tour
description: If you live for adventure and love sports, this tour is for you. Experience the thrill of surfing, skateboarding, parajumping, and rock climbing, all in one incredible package. You'll get expert coaching and plenty of adrenaline-fueled fun in some of the world's most exciting outdoor locations.

name: The Wine Taster
summary: Exquisite wines, scenic views, exclusive barrel tastings,  and much more
description: Indulge your senses on a tour through the most prestigious wine regions. Sample world-class wines, enjoy private vineyard tours, and savor gourmet meals. Whether you're a wine enthusiast or a casual drinker, this tour promises a refined experience in a beautiful setting.

name: The Star Gazer
summary: The most remote and stunningly beautiful places for seeing the night sky
description: For astronomy lovers and nature enthusiasts, this tour takes you to some of the darkest and most remote places for stargazing. Enjoy a guided exploration of the night sky, complete with telescope viewings and astrophotography opportunities. An awe-inspiring experience under the stars.

name: The Northern Lights
summary: Enjoy the Northern Lights in one of the best places in the world
description: Witness the breathtaking beauty of the Northern Lights in a once-in-a-lifetime experience. Travel to remote areas with clear night skies to see this natural phenomenon in all its glory. With knowledgeable guides, warm accommodations, and plenty of photo opportunities, this tour is a must for nature lovers.
